articles.description: Onetime pop music queen Britney Spears’ fortune is tiny compared to J-Lo, Jessica Simpson and Beyonce
articles.content:
Illustration by Forbes, Nick Ut/AP, Anthony Harvey/Getty Images,
Twenty years ago, Britney Spears was on top of the world. She was riding a four-year run of platinum No. 1 albums, a handful of Gramm… [+5128 chars]
